**Features**

- Full support for TCP and UDP port forwards as well as HTTP forwarding with unlimited virtual hosts.
- Every service includes a dedicated IPv4 address
- SSL support (with SPDY)
- Edge caching (with management via web interface)
- [More Features](http://dev.x4b.org/reverse-proxy/prices)

**GRE**

We are currently looking for beta testers for GRE/IPIP tunnels (not currently supported). Testing will take place in July. However does depend on how long it takes for a few provider issues to get resolved. 

Requirements:

- Must know how to configure and setup a GRE tunnel. We are looking for skilled people who can find fault in our design.
- Must already have a VPS/Server with tunnels enabled, one will not be provided.

Please get in contact if you are interested. You may get a month free in return!
